import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-role-add-modal', templateUrl: './role-add-modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./role-add-modal.component.css'] }) export class RoleAddModalComponent { }

Add New Role

Role

A role provided access to predefined menus and features so that depending on assigned role an administrator can have access to what he need
